|- wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, co(c2, cwwlksnon, c3), c4)), w3a(wcel(c0, co(c2, cwwlksn, c3)), wceq(cfv(c0, nat0), c1), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), c4)))

comment: An element of the set of walks of a fixed length between two vertices as word. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 15-Feb-2018.) (Revised by AV, 12-May-2021.) (Revised by AV, 14-Mar-2022.)
